name: oai-commit-mesg-gen-ius-Generator
description: AI-powered commit message generator with Conventional Commits format. Supports OpenAI, Groq, Gemini & Ollama (offline). Features: sensitive info masking, smart diff summarization, team rulesets via .commitrc.json

commands.title: AI Commit: Set OpenAI API Key
AI Commit: Set Groq API Key
AI Commit: Set Gemini API Key

aiCommit.provider.description: AI provider to use for generating commit messages

aiCommit.model.description: Model to use. Leave empty for defaults: OpenAI=gpt-4o-mini, Groq=llama-3.1-8b-instant, Gemini=gemini-1.5-flash, Ollama=llama3.2

aiCommit.ollamaUrl.description: Ollama server URL for local model inference

aiCommit.maxDiffChars.description: Maximum number of characters from the diff to send to the AI

aiCommit.exclude.description: Glob patterns for files to exclude from the diff

aiCommit.language.description: Language for commit message subject (type and scope remain in English)

aiCommit.maskSensitiveInfo.description: Mask sensitive information (API keys, passwords, tokens, etc.) in diff before sending to AI

aiCommit.summarizeLargeDiff.description: Use AI to summarize large diffs before generating commit messages

aiCommit.largeDiffThreshold.description: Character threshold for triggering diff summarization

aiCommit.issueBranchPattern.description: Regex pattern to extract issue from branch name (e.g., 'feature/(\d+)' or '(JIRA-\d+)')

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
